text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the model to outline that Article 267 ensures EU law is applied the same way across all member states. The candidate answer mentions Article 267 TFEU in Section 4, but it incorrectly frames it as a mechanism for individuals to bring a case before the CJEU (preliminary ruling) or complain about a failure to refer. It does not explicitly state the core function of Article 267, which is ensuring uniform interpretation and application of EU law by national courts (the preliminary ruling procedure).
